short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download YouTube thumbnails from videos and shorts in HD quality

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YouTube Thumbnail Downloader is a lightweight extension that allows you to easily download thumbnails from both YouTube videos and Shorts. Get access to original quality thumbnails in multiple resolutions with a clean, user-friendly interface.

Key Features:
•🎥 Multiple Quality Options:
  📺 High Quality (1920×1080)
  📹 Standard Quality (640×480)
  📼 Low Quality (480×360)
•🌐 Versatile Compatibility: Works with both YouTube Videos and Shorts.
•👁️‍🗨️ Live Preview: See thumbnail previews with resolution details.
•🌙/☀️ Theme Support: Dark and Light modes available.
•🖼️ Preserves Quality: Maintains original image resolution.
•📝 Custom Filenames: Save with quality details included.

How It Works:
•On YouTube:
  🔗 Open a Video or Shorts.
  📥 Click the extension icon to access the download button. 
•On Other Pages:
  🔗 Click the extension icon and paste a YouTube URL.
•Preview & Download:
  👀 View thumbnails in different resolutions.
  🎯 Choose and download your preferred quality.
